para.text: views are positioned and sized graphically using the mouse. A view can be selected by pressing the left mouse button over the view, selection is then shown by eight square "grabbers" appearing on the object in question. These grabbers attach at each corner and in the middle of each edge and can be manipulated with the mouse to adjust the size of a view. Multiple views can be selected by holding down the Ctrl key while clicking over each each with the mouse.
